TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會公開公用事件。The class exposes a public event. 您可以使用的屬性類別，以傳回至可存取用戶端，例如螢幕助讀程式的特定控制項的自訂說明。You can use the properties of the class to return custom help for a particular control to an accessible client, such as a screen reader. 當您處理事件，您必須設定的值， ，和屬性，以適當的值。When you handle the event, you must set the values of the , , and properties to appropriate values. > [!NOTE] > 屬性應該是數字的說明主題 ID 的字串表示法The property should be a string representation of a numeric Help topic ID. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為不是實際圖表圖例-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製它不會由圖表控制項中，沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此範例示範如何使用類別搭配事件。This example demonstrates using the class with the event. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#44)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#44)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#44)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#44)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為不是實際圖表圖例-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製它不會由圖表控制項中，沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此範例示範如何使用類別搭配事件。This example demonstrates using the class with the event. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example.
